name: ADIDAS X PELOTON 7/8 LENGTH HEAT.RDY TIGHTS
description: A high five from the instructor. Your name near the top of the leaderboard. Whatever your reasons to work out, these adidas HEAT.RDY tights support you all the way. Created with Peloton instructors, these compression-fit tights have perforations behind the knees to vent heat and moisture. Peloton graphics and 3-Stripes highlight the collaboration.

name: COURT TEAM BOUNCE INDOOR SHOES
description: All the support you need to up your indoor game. These adidas Court Team Bounce shoes keep you comfortable in fast-moving sports like volleyball, handball and badminton. Their lightweight mesh upper adds mobility without sacrificing stability. The full-length Bounce midsole cushions every landing.This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.
